question: What is Hackerstellar?
answer: Hackerstellar is a 24-hour offline coding hackathon where innovation and imagination come to life. The theme of the hackathon is Space Exploration and it is hosted by the Computer Society of India Student’s Chapter at K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering.

question: When and where is Hackerstellar taking place?
answer: Hackerstellar is a 24-hour offline coding hackathon taking place on 15th and 16th April at K. J. Somaiya College of Engineering, Vidhyavihar (East), Mumbai.

question: What is the format and structure of Hackerstellar?
answer: Hackerstellar is a problem statement based hackathon featuring three domains: Web App, AI/ML, and Blockchain. Participants will be given a problem statement per domain to work on developing innovative solutions within the given time frame of 24 Hours.

question: Who is eligible to participate and What is the team structure?
answer: Anyone with enthusiasm for coding can attend Hackerstellar. The hackathon is open to all age groups and all levels of coding experience. Teams for Hackerstellar can consist of 2-4 members, allowing for a diverse range of skills and perspectives to be brought to the table while also ensuring effective collaboration and communication within the team.

question: How do I register for Hackerstellar?
answer: You can register for Hackerstellar through Devfolio. The link to the registration page can be found on the homepage of the Hackerstellar website. Simply follow the link and complete the registration process on Devfolio to secure your spot at the hackathon.

question: What is the selection process for Hackerstellar?
answer: Hackerstellar consists of two rounds. In the first round, registered teams will be given a problem statement and must submit their solutions using a provided PowerPoint template. Based on their submissions, the top 30 teams will be selected to participate in the second, 24-hour offline round of Hackerstellar at the KJSCE Campus.

question: What facilities and activities are available at Hackerstellar?
answer: At Hackerstellar, participants will have access to complimentary food and fun activities to keep them engaged and energized throughout the event. Accommodation facilities will also be available In addition to working on their projects, participants will have the opportunity to network with like-minded individuals and learn from industry experts.

question: How will I receive important information about Hackerstellar?
answer: Once you have registered for Hackerstellar, all important information and updates will be provided to you via email and on our Discord channel. Make sure to check your email regularly and join our Discord channel to stay up-to-date with the latest news and developments.

question: Error 404: Question not found?
answer: Feel free to send us a direct message on any of our social media platforms or email us. We’ll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.
